title: ICEYE launches pilot flood scheme with If P&C Insurance
key_assets: ['Flood Insights product', 'SAR satellite constellation', 'flood extent and depth insights']
summary: ICEYE has entered a pilot scheme with If P&C Insurance to provide its Flood Insights product, leveraging its SAR satellite constellation to deliver rapid flood data and insights. The partnership aims to enhance If P&C Insurance's claims handling processes for flood-related losses and improve customer response during flood events.
why_it_matters: This partnership demonstrates the growing integration of space-based data solutions in the insurance industry, particularly for natural catastrophe response. It highlights ICEYE's role in enabling data-driven decision-making for insurers facing climate change challenges.

entities.name: Tuomas Räikkönen
entities.role: Head of Large & International Claims, If P&C Insurance
